text: Back again for lunch yesterday.  Rueben sandwich with soup and a cob salad, excellent!

On Friday nights there is a special menu along with the standard fare. Last night's shrimp scampi with angel hair was delicious.  However the best thing was the clam chowder.  The new recipe is unbelievable.  The best I've ever had including time spent in the north east.  Shelia the new Chef is amazing!
eat here 2 times a week. great service from gail. reasonaly priced and good quality.
